item.title: #TIL : Detect HTTP Response 304 Status Code in AJAX
item.description: Detect HTTP Response 304 Status Code in AJAX Sometimes, you have a interval timer to retrieve new data updates from AJAX requests.

item.title: #TIL : Reuse cookies between multi requests in Curl tool
item.description: Reuse cookies between multi requests in Curl tool Curl is good lib and tool to simulate HTTP requests.

item.title: #TIL : Sending Cookie in AJAX CORs request
item.description: Sending Cookie in AJAX CORs request By default, browser will remove the cookie and authorization header from AJAX CORs request.

item.title: #TIL : Create cross-platform downloading app URL
item.description: Create cross-platform downloading app URL You have a mobile app for both platforms iOS and Android, each platform has different download URL.

item.title: #TIL : ab failed responses
item.description: ab failed responses When benchmarking a HTTP application server using ab tool, you shouldn’t only care about how many requests per second, but percentage of Success responses.
